tit.e: Mt. Oshio (a mountain in the Nishiyama mountain range in the western Kyoto City)
Mt. Oshio (a mountain in the Nishiyama mountain range in the western Kyoto City)

sen.j: 小塩山（おしおやま）は、京都府京都市西京区にある山である。
sen.e: Mt. Oshio is a mountain located in Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Mt. Oshio is a mountain located in Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Mt. Oshio is a mountain located in Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 京都市西方の西山山地に位置する山である。
sen.e: Mt Oshio is located in the Nishiyama mountain range in the western Kyoto City.
Mt. Oshio is located in the Nishiyama mountain range in the western Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを補足しました。
sen.e: Mt. Oshio is located in the Nishiyama mountain range in the western Kyoto City.

sen.j: 当山の東のふもとには勝持寺（花の寺）、大原野神社、洛西ニュータウンがある。
sen.e: At the foot of the mountain, there is Shoji-ji Temple (the Temple of Flowers) as well as Oharano-jinja Shrine and Rakusai New Town.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: At the foot of the mountain, there is Shoji-ji Temple (the Temple of Flowers) as well as Oharano-jinja Shrine and Rakusai New Town.
At the foot of the mountain, there is Shoji-ji Temple (the Temple of Flowers) as well as Oharano-jinja Shrine and Rakusai New Town.

sen.j: このニュータウンからはこの山の山容をはっきりと見る事ができる。
sen.e: You can have a great view of this mountain from Rakusai New Town.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: You can have a clear view of this mountain from Rakusai New Town.
You can have a clear view of this mountain from Rakusai New Town.

sen.j: また京都市中心部の眺望が良い所や清水寺からも西方の遠くにこの山を見る事ができる。
sen.e: You can also see the mountain far in the west, from some lookout points and Kiyomizudera Temple in the central Kyoto City.
You can also see the mountain far in the west, from some lookout points and Kiyomizu-dera Temple in the central Kyoto City.
You can also see the mountain far in the west, from some lookout points and Kiyomizu-dera Temple in the central Kyoto City.

sen.j: 山のふもとから山頂まで舗装道である京都府道141号小塩山大原野線が通っている。
sen.e: A paved road, Kyoto Prefectural Road 141 Oshio-Oharano Route, runs from the foot to the top of the mountain.
A paved road, Kyoto Prefectural Road 141 Oshio-Oharano Line, runs from the foot to the top of the mountain.
A paved road, Kyoto Prefectural Road 141 Oshio-Oharano Line, runs from the foot to the top of the mountain.

sen.j: 以前は一般車も通行が可能だったが、現在は一般車両通行禁止（徒歩では通行可能）となっている。
sen.e: Regular vehicles cannot enter in the mountain any more while pedestrians are allowed.
Regular vehicles could also enter the mountain before, however they are restricted now (pedestrians are allowed to enter).
Regular vehicles could also enter the mountain before, however they are restricted now (pedestrians are allowed to enter).

sen.j: 山頂は淳和天皇の遺灰を散骨した場所とされ、大原野西嶺上陵（淳和天皇陵）がある。
sen.e: It is said that the ashes of the deceased Emperor Junna was scattered at the mountaintop and there remains Oharano no nishi no mine no misasagi (the tomb of the Emperor Junna.)
It is said that the ashes of the deceased Emperor Junna was scattered at the mountaintop and there remains Oharano no nishi no mine no misasagi (the tomb of the Emperor Junna).
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を変えました。
sen.e: It is said that the ashes of the deceased Emperor Junna was scattered at the mountaintop and there remains Oharano no nishi no mine no misasagi (the tomb of the Emperor Junna).

sen.j: また山頂付近には在京都FM局の送信所が置かれ、府南部の広範囲に電波を発射している。
sen.e: Around the mountaintop are transmitting facilities for FM radio stations in Kyoto which enable broadcast in the extensive area of the southern Kyoto Prefecture.
Around the mountaintop are transmitting facilities for FM radio stations in Kyoto which enable broadcast in the extensive area of the southern Kyoto Prefecture.
Around the mountaintop are transmitting facilities for FM radio stations in Kyoto which enable broadcast in the extensive area of the southern Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: FM放送局送信施設概要
sen.e: Summary of FM broadcasting station transmitting facilities
Summary of FM broadcasting station transmitting facilities
Summary of FM broadcasting station transmitting facilities

sen.j: 送信所置局住所は、京都市西京区大原野春日町1411番地となる。
sen.e: The address of the transmitting facilities is 1411 Kasuga-cho, Oharano, Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The address of the transmitting facilities is 1411 Kasuga-cho, Oharano, Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The address of the transmitting facilities is 1411 Kasuga-cho, Oharano, Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 尚、NHK京都FMについては、NHK京都放送局放送局概要も参照の事。
sen.e: Refer to "Summary of NHK Kyoto Broadcasting Station" for NHK Kyoto FM.
sen.cmt: 「NHK京都放送局放送局概要」該当記事のタイトルと異なりますが、原文どおり訳しました。
sen.e: Also refer to the article of Summary of NHK Kyoto Broadcasting Station for NHK Kyoto FM.
Also refer to the article of Summary of NHK Kyoto Broadcasting Station for NHK Kyoto FM.
